video_prompt: Blindfolded woman's hair gently sways. Tears stream, reflecting light, while lips subtly part. Smoke wisps from her head, dissolving into the air. Golden particles drift around her and across a flickering background.
image_prompt: **`/imagine prompt: Digital painting of a serene, blindfolded woman with long dark hair, chest-up, three-quarter profile, head tilted upwards. Silver tears stream from under her blindfold. She wears an opulent gold and silver necklace over an off-white lace top with gold embroidery and a dark corseted bodice. Warm glow illuminates her face. Vibrant red backdrop with shimmering golden particles and gilded architectural elements. In the background, a framed gothic castle painting under a twilight sky, also with golden particles. Wisps of smoke/magic emanate from her head. Dreamy, mystical, melancholic atmosphere, elegant. detailed. atmospheric lighting. intricate. high resolution.`**
refined_video_prompt: Hair gently sways. Tears stream, light glinting on them, as lips subtly part. Smoke wisps from her head, dissolving into the air. Golden particles drift around her, while the background flickers and shifts.
